articles.author: CNN
articles.title: READ: Former President Jimmy Carter's statement on the death of George Floyd
articles.description: Former President Jimmy Carter became the latest -- and final -- living former president to weigh in on the death of George Floyd, who was killed while in police custody last week.

articles.author: Chauncey Alcorn, CNN Business
articles.title: Analysis: Five things corporate America can do besides tweeting to combat anti-black racism
articles.description: Major companies have expressed solidarity with the collective plight of African Americans this week following the horrifying murder by police of George Floyd a week ago and the national chaos that has erupted in its wake.

articles.author: Ray Sanchez Melanie Schuman and Anna Sturla, CNN
articles.title: Video appears to show Louisville BBQ man fired gun before he was fatally shot, police say
articles.description: Video released by Louisville police appears to show a popular BBQ man firing at officers outside his business before he was fatally shot.

articles.author: Jacqueline Howard, CNN
articles.title: ER visits for non-Covid emergencies have dropped 42% during the pandemic, CDC says
articles.description: The CDC warns that some people may be putting off getting emergency care for serious health conditions during the coronavirus pandemic -- and fewer visits for critical conditions could result in complications or even death.

articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen, Senior Medical Correspondent
articles.title: Trump said he took hydroxychloroquine to prevent coronavirus, but new study shows that doesn't work
articles.description: On the heels of studies showing hydroxychloroquine doesn't help patients in the hospital with Covid-19, a new study -- the first of its kind -- shows the drug doesn't work to prevent infection with the virus, either.

articles.author: Analysis by Daniel Burke, CNN Religion Editor
articles.title: Trump's religious photo-ops aren't about piety. They're about power
articles.description: President Trump's recent visits to a church and a Catholic shrine capture his approach to religion: He readily uses religious symbols to fight a winner-take-all culture war.

articles.title: Store owner refuses to call police for future nonviolent crime
articles.description: Mahmoud Abumayyaleh, the store owner of Cup Foods whose clerk initially contacted police about George Floyd, says his store will no longer be contacting the authorities in cases of nonviolent crime, following the death of George Floyd.

articles.author: Nathan Hodge and Mary Ilyushina, CNN
articles.title: Anti-gay viral video stirs outrage ahead of Russian referendum
articles.description: An anti-LGBTQ ad by a pro-Kremlin news portal has sparked outrage on Russian social media -- and drawn attention to a propaganda campaign for a national referendum that could pave the way for Russian President Vladimir Putin to stay in power until 2036.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Nickelodeon and ViacomCBS cable channels go dark for nearly 9 minutes
articles.description: To honor the memory of George Floyd, all of ViacomCBS' cable channels went silent earlier this week.
